SCHEDULE_PRESC_STATUS: Schedule and Prescription status (check all that applies): The product is
SCHEDULE_C: included in Schedule C (radiopharmacurticals) to the Food and Drugs Act
SCHEDULE_D: included in Schedule D (biologicals) to the Food and Drugs Act
SCHEDULE_F: included in Schedule F (prescription drugs) to the Food and Drug Regulations
REGULATED_CDSA: regulated under the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act
NON_PRESC_SCHEDULE_A: a non-prescription drug to which one or more Schedule A claims apply
FAKE.APPENDIX_MISSING_ERROR: with the Human /Animal Sourced Records, missing source
FAKE.APPENDIX_EXTRA_ERROR: with the Human /Animal Sourced Records, extra source
